channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report X-2024120749
item.description:
Report X-2024120749

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-16T12:32:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-03
  • City: GALLUP
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF Railway Company
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 3500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During an inspection in the Gallup yard, the FRA inspector found SHQX 7254 leaking and producing a white crystallization of the ammonium nitrate liquid around the bottom outlet valve. The HM manager responded and found a less-than-tool-tight BOV cap. There was an approximate 1-cup release to soil. The gasket was intact, but there was a small drip from the ball valve itself. The cap was cleaned, threads were taped, and the cap was tool-tightened, stopping any further release.
